title: Shortcut conflict with national keyboard mapping
author: mfigatowski
body_snippet:
Hi,
I'm using mRemoteNG with polish keyboard settings. I can't type two polish national characters (ć - Control-Alt-C, ś - Control-Alt-S) in  web panels (HTTP/HTTPS protocol).

## Expected Behavior
National characters correctly passed to HTTP/HTTPS connections

## Current Behavior
Control-Alt-C switches from web page text box to Connection / Config panel

## Possible Solution
A way to redefine shortcuts in mRemoteNG. Or to disable it.
